title: Subpart 8186-10 - Adjusted Base Proportions For Certain Approved Assessing Units
content:
Subpart 8186-10 - Adjusted Base Proportions For Certain Approved Assessing Units

State Regulations
§ 8186-10.3 - Determination of base percentages, current percentages and current base proportions
§ 8186-10.4 - Report of base percentages, current percentages and current base proportions
§ 8186-10.5 - Determination of adjusted base proportions
§ 8186-10.6 - Notification of adjusted base proportions
§ 8186-10.8 - Special procedures for a new portion class

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
